description: Ability to state limits, seek clarity, and manage workload expectations
Ability to adjust decisions and approach when situations change
Ability to remain composed and separate emotions from facts
Sense of responsibility and follow-through without supervision
Ability to ask questions and seek understanding
Ability to sustain effort despite difficulty or slow progress
Tendency to apply learning to real-world contexts
Ability to take feedback constructively under pressure
Ability to work effectively with people with different perspectives
